word_mean: 享乐至上说。追求享乐的行为

sentence.Network_en: The age of hedonism is being ushered out by a new era of temperance.
sentence.Network_cn: 享乐主义时代正让位于一个注重节制的时代。

sentence.Network_en: We strongly disagree with the doctrine of hedonism.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们强烈反对享乐主义学说。

sentence.Network_en: Hedonism and frivolity will diffuse hell tnrough all our days.
sentence.Network_cn: 享乐主义和轻薄浮佻会将地狱扩展到我们的整个日子之中.

entry.def: Hedonism is the belief that gaining pleasure is the most important thing in life.

means.word_mean: 1. the pursuit of pleasure as a matter of ethical principle
2. an ethical system that evaluates the pursuit of pleasure as the highest good

auth_sentence.content: The political choice was between two versions of hedonism.
auth_sentence.res_content: The political choice was between two versions of hedonism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The political choice was between two versions of hedonism.

auth_sentence.content: But hedonism is too strong a human impulse, he believes.
auth_sentence.res_content: But hedonism is too strong a human impulse, he believes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But hedonism is too strong a human impulse, he believes.

auth_sentence.content: Edward's hedonism made him the ultimate symbol of the Belle Epoque.
auth_sentence.res_content: Edward's hedonism made him the ultimate symbol of the Belle Epoque.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Edward's hedonism made him the ultimate symbol of the Belle Epoque.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具备某种性质"; 2. 表示"学术或学术流派,行业"; 3. 表示"行为,现象,状态"; 4. 表示"疾病"; 5. 名词,表示"各种主义,宗教"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurb荒唐的+ism具备某种性质→n.荒诞主义
ant=anti反对,对抗+agon斗争+ism具备某种性质→n.对抗,敌对
brutal残忍的,兽性的+ism具备某种性质→n.兽性
human人+ism具备某种性质→n.人道主义
mech机器+an+ism具备某种性质→n.机械装置,机构,机制
atom原子+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.原子说,原子论
fatal命运注定的+ism学术或学术流派→n.宿命论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 印象派艺术家,印象流派
stems_affixes.word_buile: impression印象+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.印象派艺术家,印象流派
journal杂志,日报+ism行业→n.新闻业,报章杂志
magnet磁体,磁铁+ism学术→n.磁;魅力;催眠术
modern现代的+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.现代主义,现代派

stems_affixes.value_cn: 老师气质[派头],儿童教学法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 野蛮,未开化,原始,不文明

a无+stigma斑点+tism=ism疾病→n.散光
atav祖先+ism疾病→n.[生]隔代遗传,返祖现象

rheum稀黏液+at+ism疾病→n.风湿病
